Name: Futurama
Title: How Hermes Requisitioned His Groove Back
Desc: Fry begins a romance with the new bureaucrat when Hermes is sent away.
LongDescription: When Hermes goes on vacation, an attractive bureaucrat takes his place at Planet Express. Voices of Billy West, Katey Sagal, John Di Maggio, Phil LaMarr and Lauren Tom. Guest voice: Nora Dunn.
